message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.ST, cs.DS, cs.MA

This paper deals with the problem of active learning in multi-armed bandits, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses the use of upper confidence bound algorithms, which are commonly used in reinforcement learning and optimization problems. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.ST (Statistics), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
